Public Sub Complete ()

abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

summary.span: 向 發出訊號，表示不應接受也不應產生任何其他訊息，也不應使用任何其他延後的訊息。

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，並將其工作會進入最終的狀態已經處理所有先前可用的資料。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 將不會封鎖等候完成發生，而是會起始要求但等候完成發生，可能使用的工作。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };
member this.Completion : System.Threading.Tasks.Task

summary.span: 取得 ，其表示非同步作業和資料流程區塊的完成。

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流程區塊會被視為完成，但當它目前未處理訊息，而且當它有保證，不會處理任何訊息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 傳回相關聯的區塊完成時，會轉換為已完成的狀態。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 它會轉為區塊本身完成處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block's defined semantics. 它就會轉換成狀態，當資料流程區塊完成提前因為未處理的例外狀況處理，並將轉為資料流程區塊完成時的狀態正在處理不當，由於收到取消要求。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 如果工作會在完成狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包含任何項目正在處理的區塊或區塊已經處理的任何項目。The does not include any items currently being processed by the block or any items that have already been processed by the block.

summary.span: 造成 在 的狀態中完成。

span.span: Causes the to complete in a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，並將其工作將會進入最終狀態。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state. 錯誤區塊，做為與取消區塊中，會導致遺失緩衝的訊息 （未處理的輸入的訊息，以及 unoffered 的輸出訊息）。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有執行個體連結到這執行個體可能會使用，並且它必須只能保留先前提供此來源到目標執行個體。Only instances linked to this instance may use , and it must only be used to reserve instances previously offered by this source to the target. 如果`true`會傳回必須後續呼叫或這個訊息。If `true` is returned, the must subsequently call either or for this message. 若要這樣做可能會導致無法傳播至這個或其他目標的任何其他訊息的來源。Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets. 必須不時呼叫的目標持有任何內部的鎖定。 must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks. 這樣會違反鎖定階層以避免死結的資料流程網路。Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.

summary.span: 提供了訊息給，讓目標有機會使用或延後訊息。

span.span: Offers a message to the , giving the target the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
The status of the offered message.

returns.span: 如果目標已接受訊息，則會傳回 ，而且來源不應該再使用所提供的訊息，因為現在它是由目標擁有。

span.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target.

returns.span: 如果訊息已由目標延後，會以通知形式傳回 ，目標稍後可能會嘗試使用或保留訊息，同時來源仍擁有訊息，而且可能會將訊息提供給其他區塊。

span.span: If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.

returns.span: 如果目標會延後，但來源是 ，則改為傳回 。

span.span: If the target would have otherwise postponed but source was , is instead returned.

returns.span: 如果目標嘗試接受訊息，但因為來源將訊息傳遞給另一個目標或直接捨棄訊息，使得目標遺漏訊息，則會傳回 。

span.span: If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目標選擇不接受訊息，則會傳回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目標選擇不接受此訊息，且將不會接受來自此來源的其他訊息，則會傳回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
